Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes

Class DashboardScene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.observer.Observable<ClientController>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes.BasicSceneUpdater
it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes.DashboardScene
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpyScene
public class DashboardScene extends BasicSceneUpdater
Home page of game Rappresent the dashboard with all user resources and faith track, and cards Here user can navigate to Market,Shop,Spy and do whatever action he need in this turn

    • addClickOnLeaderTradeCard

      public void addClickOnLeaderTradeCard​(int i, LeaderCard card, javafx.scene.image.ImageView image, ClientController controller)
      check if this card is trade and active, in case add to itt event listener to activate leader
      Parameters:
      i - card index selected (0-1)
      card - card selected
      image - image viewed by user
      controller - client controller (this function is called from inside an observer lambda)
